GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all available API endpoints

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all available categories; example shows a singular category

categories.description: Strategy-focused board games that prioritise limited-randomness

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: returns a single review object specified by the parametric review_id

review.title: Culture a Love of Agriculture With Agricola
review.review_body: You could sum up Agricola with the simple phrase 'Farmyeard Fun' but the mechanics and game play add so much more than that. You'll find yourself torn between breeding pigs, or sowing crops. Its joyeous and rewarding and it makes you think of time spent outside, which is much harder to do these days!

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all available reviews; example shows a representative review

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given review_id
